articles.title: Envoy: Duterte willing to open facilities to US if Ukraine-Russia crisis spills over to Asia - GMA News Online
articles.description: President Rodrigo Duterte has expressed his willingness to open Philippine facilities to the United States military if the Russian-Ukraine crisis spills over to the Asian region, Manila's top diplomat to Washington said Thursday.
